Gram.name: Gram
Gram.effect: +1 strikes, Critical +18%, functions as a Miracle Charm

Nothung.name: Nothung
Nothung.effect: Light damage +15, Dark resistance +15, recovers all durability every Chapter

Vritra.name: Vritra
Vritra.effect: Critical +18%, negates the damage-reducing effect of Vajra, functions as a Miracle Charm

Zanbato.name: Zanbato
Zanbato.effect: Ignores rider's defense and shields when calculating damage to horses

Balmung.name: Balmung
Balmung.effect: Critical +12%, provides Parry skill, Rank 1 if not given to Kramer

Poison Mace.name: Poison Mace
Poison Mace.effect: 33% to inflict poison on hit, becomes Holy Mace if taken

Stun Knife.name: Stun Knife
Stun Knife.effect: 33% chance to disarm enemy on hit

Shieldknife.name: Shieldknife
Shieldknife.effect: Critical +33%, reduces damage taken by half

Swordbreaker.name: Swordbreaker
Swordbreaker.effect: 33% chance to break enemy's sword on hit

Poison Knife.name: Poison Knife
Poison Knife.effect: 66% chance to inflict poison on hit, becomes Dagger if taken

Sleep Knife.name: Sleep Knife
Sleep Knife.effect: 20% chance to inflict sleep on hit, becomes Dagger if taken

Doru.name: Doru
Doru.effect: For each adjacent ally equipping a Doru, Accuracy +5 and Defense +1

Iron Lance.name: Iron Lance
Iron Lance.effect: Mounted only, cannot counter or be countered

Oxtongue.name: Oxtongue
Oxtongue.effect: Mounted only, cannot counter or be countered

Xyston.name: Xyston
Xyston.effect: Mounted only, cannot counter or be countered

Greatlance.name: Greatlance
Greatlance.effect: Mounted only, cannot counter or be countered

Drakelance.name: Drakelance
Drakelance.effect: Mounted only, cannot counter or be countered

Pascanion.name: Pascanion
Pascanion.effect: Defense +6, Avoid +18%, Fire damage +10, (50 - Bow Skill)% chance of damage to self

Poison Arrow.name: Poison Arrow
Poison Arrow.effect: Inflicts poison, becomes Wood Arrow if taken

Sleep Arrow.name: Sleep Arrow
Sleep Arrow.effect: Inflicts sleep, becomes Wood Arrow if taken

Pallas Leia.name: Pallas Leia
Pallas Leia.effect: Recovers 2 MP when advancing to the next chapter

Flametongue.name: Flametongue
Flametongue.effect: Fire Dragons only, ignores user's Mag

Blazetongue.name: Blazetongue
Blazetongue.effect: Fire Dragons only, ignores user's Mag

Pallas Riana.name: Pallas Riana
Pallas Riana.effect: 4 consecutive hits, recovers 8 MP when advancing to the next chapter

Sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
Sandstorm.effect: Wyverns only, Critical +3%, 3 consecutive hits, ignores user's Mag

Windtongue.name: Windtongue
Windtongue.effect: Wyverns only, Critical +6%, ignores user's Mag

Icetongue.name: Icetongue
Icetongue.effect: Snow Dragons only, 33% chance of inflicting sleep, ignores user's Mag

Pallas Serenia.name: Pallas Serenia
Pallas Serenia.effect: Recovers 2 MP when advancing to the next chapter

Stormtongue.name: Stormtongue
Stormtongue.effect: Thunder Dragons only, Cripple rate x2, ignores user's Mag

Holy.name: Holy
Holy.effect: Attacks first in combat, leaves enemy with minimum of 1 HP

Starlight.name: Starlight
Starlight.effect: Recovers 2 MP when advancing to the next chapter

Soothe.name: Soothe
Soothe.effect: Heals an adjacent ally for (Mag/2+3) HP

Heal.name: Heal
Heal.effect: Heals an adjacent ally for (Mag+3)x[1+(Light Skill/100)] HP

Mend.name: Mend
Mend.effect: Heals an adjacent ally for (Mag+10)x[1+(Light Skill/100)] HP

Physic.name: Physic
Physic.effect: Heals one ally within three hexes for (Mag+3)x[1+(Light Skill/100)] HP

Fortify.name: Fortify
Fortify.effect: Heals all allies within three hexes for (Mag+3)x[1+(Light Skill/100)] HP; costs 1 MP per 8 units healed, rounded up

Return.name: Return
Return.effect: Allows an ally to escape the map

Nosferatu.name: Nosferatu
Nosferatu.effect: Restores HP equal to damage done

Nosferatu+.name: Nosferatu+
Nosferatu+.effect: Restores HP equal to damage done

Scylla.name: Scylla
Scylla.effect: Adds enemy's level to attack power

Tumahann.name: Tumahann
Tumahann.effect: Takes away Exp equal to damage done, can cause leveling down

Kishar's Wrath.name: Kishar's Wrath
Kishar's Wrath.effect: Cannot counter or be countered, no effect on flying foes

Wormwood.name: Wormwood
Wormwood.effect: Cannot counter or be countered, leaves enemy with minimum of 1 HP

Darkmend.name: Darkmend
Darkmend.effect: Heals one ally within five hexes for (Mag+10)x[1+(Dark Skill/100)] HP

Sleep.name: Sleep
Sleep.effect: Inflicts sleep on an enemy with lower Mag for 2-5 turns

Berserk.name: Berserk
Berserk.effect: Inflicts berserk on an enemy with lower Mag for 1-3 turns

Aiantos.name: Aiantos
Aiantos.effect: 100% accuracy against bows, crossbows, and ballistae

Vollenden.name: Vollenden
Vollenden.effect: Mag +3, does 8 Light damage when blocking

Hestia.name: Hestia
Hestia.effect: Fire resistance +7, does 7 Fire damage when blocking

Black Shield.name: Black Shield
Black Shield.effect: When blocking, 33% chance of damaging enemy instead

Amaterasu Shield.name: Amaterasu Shield
Amaterasu Shield.effect: Fire resistance +18, Wind resistance +18, Thunder resistance +18, Light resistance +18

Peerless Brace.name: Peerless Brace
Peerless Brace.effect: Strength +1, Defense +1, Speed +1, Mag +1, Accuracy +5, Avoid +5

Fortune Charm.name: Fortune Charm
Fortune Charm.effect: 50% chance of negating fatal attacks (but breaks after the battle)

Miracle Charm.name: Miracle Charm
Miracle Charm.effect: Negates fatal attacks (but breaks after the battle)

Broken Lyre.name: Broken Lyre
Broken Lyre.effect: Broken Sleep Harp, cannot be used

Ice Scale.name: Ice Scale
Ice Scale.effect: Wind resistance +30, Thunder resistance +10, Fire resistance -10, Critical vulnerability +12%

Wyvern Scale.name: Wyvern Scale
Wyvern Scale.effect: Wind resistance +20, Fire resistance +5, Thunder resistance -5, Critical vulnerability +18%

Thunder Scale.name: Thunder Scale
Thunder Scale.effect: (unused) Thunder resistance +30, Wind resistance +8, Fire resistance +5, does 6 Thunder damage when hit, Critical vulnerability +12%

Thor Scale.name: Thor Scale
